subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: for mike E. and other new people
author: juli velazquez
full_text:
--0-347133591-1205949122=:68681
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Nellie:
              My personal opinion with all the research and testing as well as building of the boxes, they (the otherside) all know about Frank and the Box.  In my previous encounters it seems like they just wait until you turn it on.  My first message I ever got mentioned Frank, and asked if he was with me.  I was so very excited at the fact that they mentioned him by name, to me it was validation that this communication all had meaning!
   
  Juli

Nellie Kampmann <rednellie@...> wrote:
          This is an interesting conversation. Personally, I use my hack to
communicate with a spirit who is definitely grounded. Sometimes the
communications come through as bits of radio waves put together to
form words or sentences, and other times, they sound more like
traditional evps. One of the little things I'm trying to figure out
is why I could never get evps from him after a year of trying, but he
has taken to communicating through the box like a fish to water.

Nellie


                           


  The contents of this eletronic correspondence is private & confidential and meant only for the party and/or parties it is addressed to.
